channel.title: THL Android App on Academic Profile
channel.description: Recent content in THL Android App on Academic Profile

item.title: THL Android App
item.description: Background: Research in psychology commonly relies on questionnaires as a way of collecting empirical data on many different topics of human health (Herrmann 1982, Schwarz & Oyserman 2001), such as behavior (Buss & Perry 1992), memory (Hinkin 1998), and cognition (Khawaja & Oei 1992). For this particular purpose, psychologists, clinicians, and researchers use sets of thematic questions printed on paper (questionnaires) to achieve their goal of gathering data. This conventional approach, however, also imposes major difficulties for the completion of psychological surveys.
